items.title: Ukrainian city hit by 'massive' strike as peace talks in US conclude
items.description: Russia carried out strikes on Kremenchuk, while its defence ministry said it had shot down 77 Ukrainian drones in several locations.

items.title: The Papers: Starmer to 'fight on' and 'Dad's plea to Meghan'
items.description: A mix of stories leads Sunday front pages.

items.title: Staff and tourists among 25 killed in Goa nightclub fire
items.description: Officials believe a gas canister explosion triggered the fire which tore through the busy nightlife venue.

items.title: Young people on benefits to be offered construction and hospitality work
items.description: The government says it will fund training and work experience for 350,000 not in work or education.

items.title: Hong Kong to vote in election as city mourns deadly fire
items.description: The Legislative Council election is seen as a test of public sentiment following a deadly fire that angered some.
